citations.title: **Deep Learning book** by Goodfellow, Bengio, Courville - [free online](
1. **[Neural Ordinary Differential Equations]( (Chen et al., NeurIPS 2018) - connects ODEs to deep learning
2. **[Physics-informed neural networks]( (Raissi et al., JCP 2019) - embed physics constraints
3. **[Denoising Diffusion Probabilistic Models]( (Ho et al., NeurIPS 2020) - stochastic processes meet generative modeling
4. **[Tackling Climate Change with Machine Learning]( (Rolnick et al., 2022) - comprehensive survey
[Physics-informed machine learning (Karniadakis et al., Nature Reviews Physics, 2021)](
[Tackling Climate Change with Machine Learning (Rolnick et al., ACM Computing Surveys, 2022)](
